# Welcome to my repository contributing guide!
Thank you for investing your time in contributing to my project! Any contribution you make will be reflected on my learning objective :sparkles:.

## Contribution types and what we're looking for

Content I'm looking for:
* Technical and grammatical corrections
* Typo fixes
* Expanded explanation, documentation and code comment for the current code
* New content filling important gaps in the UI/UX of an existing project.

Content we do not currently accept:
* Edits purely for aesthetic
* Topics that are too niche or a matter of personal preference

## Commit
Comit your code in organized and understandable format.

## Pull Request
Following the [Pull Request Template](./PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md) execute a pull request to our repository.

Once the code gets reviewed, if no issues are found the code will be merged with the main branch ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰!
